summary:
This mod will allow you to adopt a child from the Honorhall Orphanage in riften.The Adopted child
can be your follower and actually fight for you.
descriptionHtml:
Adopt a child.
==============

This mod will allow you to adopt a child from the Honorhall Orphanage in riften.

To adopt the child simply talk to the constance Mitchel in Riften.

Pay the One time Adoption Fee and You are ready to adopt the child.

Take a child with you in your adventure or simply ask them to go to your
house.

They can stay at any place.

If you keep them happy they even play games with you.

Fully Compatible with killable Children Mod.

Fully Compatible with EFF Mod.

Fully Compatible with Killable Children mods.

They can be follower and actually fights for you.


Change Log
===========
Updated to Ver 0.6

Added Multi adoption system.You can adopt three child at one time.

Follower child can now fight for you no anymore running.You can have
three childs folllowing you.

Added four new child at orphanage including vampire child and 1 orc
child just for testing purpose.

==================================================================

Ver 0.5.1

Added support for custom houses.

Fully compatible with My home Is Your Home mod.

Constance mitchell is essential now.

fixed some dialogues issues.
============================================

I will keep working on this mod until Bethasda new dlc hits the
Pc.

Future Plan

Custom race childrens for adoption.


Installation

Just put data folder where you installed your skyrim game.

those who don\'t get dialogue working save the game with mod installed
exit the game and restart the save this will fix the problem.

Thank you


Thanks for memorablelol for his amazing video

[youtube]jRpQQWL3vAo[/youtube]

Thanks for Brodual for his amazing video

[youtube]suZgNnC2yBE[/youtube]
author: Praveen
